org.jpac

Class SignedIntegerMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.SignedIntegerMapper

  • public class SignedIntegerMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    used to map a signed integer signal to another signed integer signal.

      SignedIntegerMapper(SignedInteger source, SignedInteger target)
      if constructed by this constructor, the SignedIntegerMapper uses the given signed integers min and max values for mapping

      • SignedIntegerMapper

        public SignedIntegerMapper()

      • SignedIntegerMapper

        public SignedIntegerMapper(SignedInteger source,
                   SignedInteger target)
        if constructed by this constructor, the SignedIntegerMapper uses the given signed integers min and max values for mapping
        Parameters:
        source - the source signed integer
        target - the target signed integer the source signed integer is mapped to

        maps an int value

        the mapped value
